verbs.description: australian mom shields baby during [ARG1: horrific hailstorm] [V: australia] a 23-year - old australian woman is in recovery after getting horrific bruises on her body while shielding her infant daughter from hailstones on thursday hail ripped through her car hitting her body i ’ve learnt my lesson today never drive in a hail storm fiona simpson
